game.name: OverField
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, In-App Purchases, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option
game.shortDescription: 미니어처 작은 세계 포근한 라이트 소셜 오픈 월드 대모험 안녕하세요! 함께 오픈 스페이스를 탐험해요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tiny Miniature World Cozy Light Social Grand Open Adventure Hello! Let's explore the OverField together!

reviewHighlights.text: 本人国服50级玩家，至少游玩了3个月 音乐和美术都是相当可以的，但是策划和老李太不当人了 国际服依然是树和扭蛋，甚至狐妖套也是要累充3000块才能拿到的，国服圈完了国际服继续圈是吧 优化依然是差的一批，甚至比国服还卡 服务器延迟也逆天，玩3分钟转了2次圈，交互也有明显的延迟，甚至有的时候直接登录不进...
I wanted to give this game a thumbs up, but the steam version, and even some of the design choice itself, just has so many flaws, that it's hard to re...
